name: Timerift
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A 20 foot radius sphere centered on target point within range that you can see is twisted and warped that any creature in the area or touching the area is shunted into a parallel timeline. While the spell lasts, they can't take any action.

Any creature that enters the area over the duration is similarly affected.

When the spell ends, all affected creatures reappear in the closest empty space to their original location and must succeed on an Intuition saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn.

At the start of each of your turns, you must pay 20 MP to keep concentrating on the spell. If you can't, the spell ends.
